spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: You cast one the following cleric spells (spell save {@dc 11}), using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)
entries: You target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
